long_description: Bringing the kids along for the ride? The Burley D'Lite, Burley's flagship bike trailer, is tricked out with all the convenience, comfort and safety features a parent could ask for. Deluxe reclining seats accommodate 1 or 2 children; removable, washable seat pad and shoulder straps offer comfort for the kids and easy clean-up for the adults. Bowed-out sides offer increased interior space so that passengers can enjoy more shoulder room. 5-point harness system with padded shoulder straps keeps kids secure. Recessed helmet pocket lets helmeted children move their heads around, or sleep, comfortably. Interior pocket stashes their travel necessities, such as toys or snacks. Convenient weather-resistant cover shields little ones from the elements; also includes retractable sunshield. Tinted side windows are UV protected and offer great visibility, whether looking in or out. Trailer frame is made with light, strong aluminum tubes and features a full internal roll cage for enhanced safety. Included tow arm and hitch installs quickly and makes it easy to tow the D'Lite behind your bicycle. Features 20 in. quick-release wheels that can be attached and detached with the push of a button. Adjustable suspension system keeps kids comfortable by softening bumps, jostles and shimmies. Wheel guards on the trailer's frame keep the trailer wheels from coming into contact with obstacles. Rear cargo area stores extra gear, toys or groceries. Reflective materials, wheel reflectors and a safety flag enhance visibility of trailer. Convert your Burley D'Lite trailer to a stroller or jogger with Burley accessory kits, sold separately. Includes a height-adjustable, padded handlebar and a parking brake for convenient conversion to a stroller or jogger when kits are added. Trailer can be folded down quickly for storage and transport.
